About the job
About AngelHack Developer Labs
Are you excited to shape and deliver transformative digital solutions that push the boundaries of innovation? At AngelHack Developer Labs, we empower businesses to bring their digital visions to life through custom software development across mobile, web, AI, and Web3.

From mobile applications to AI-powered platforms and decentralized applications, our team is committed to creating impactful, forward-thinking solutions.

About the Role
We‚Äôre looking for a Full Stack Developer based in Singapore to join one of our product squads working on web and mobile platforms that serve thousands of users.

You‚Äôll work across the stack ‚Äî from user-facing interfaces to backend services ‚Äî while collaborating with your squad‚Äôs designers, product managers, and technical lead to deliver scalable, well-crafted solutions.

You‚Äôll also be part of a forward-thinking engineering culture that embraces AI-assisted workflows ‚Äî using tools like GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT, and Cursor to code faster, automate smarter, and focus more on problem-solving than boilerplate.

This is a mid-level position suited for someone who enjoys variety, takes ownership of their work, and wants to grow into a senior or lead role within a high-performing, AI-driven environment.

Key Responsibilities
üß© Build & Deliver
Design, develop, and maintain full-stack web and mobile applications using modern frameworks (React, React Native, Node.js/NestJS, TypeScript, Supabase/Postgres).
Collaborate with your squad to deliver features end-to-end ‚Äî from technical scoping to production deployment.
Implement clean, maintainable, and testable code following squad-level best practices.
Contribute to CI/CD pipelines, performance tuning, and integration with internal/external APIs.

‚öôÔ∏è Collaborate & Learn
Work closely with your Technical Lead to ensure architectural consistency and technical excellence across projects.
Participate in code reviews, design discussions, and squad retrospectives.
Provide input during sprint shaping to balance user needs with technical feasibility.
Document your work clearly and contribute to shared engineering knowledge bases.

ü§ñ AI-Enhanced Development
Use AI tools to accelerate development, testing, and documentation ‚Äî while maintaining code quality and readability.
Help your squad identify repeatable workflows that can be standardized or automated through AI.
Share learnings and insights to improve the broader engineering team‚Äôs AI development practices.

üß† Ownership & Quality
Take responsibility for your features in staging and production ‚Äî ensuring stability, performance, and security.
Collaborate with QA and DevOps to debug, optimize, and resolve incidents quickly.
Continuously refactor and improve existing systems to support growth and maintainability.

Ideal Skills & Experience
3‚Äì5 years of hands-on experience in full-stack software development.
Bachelor‚Äôs Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or Information Technology
Strong proficiency in TypeScript, React, and Node.js/NestJS.
Familiarity with React Native for mobile development (or willingness to learn).
Good understanding of REST/GraphQL APIs, database schema design, and DevOps basics (CI/CD, Docker, etc.).
Strong collaboration and communication skills ‚Äî able to work effectively in English with cross-functional teams.
Experience using AI-assisted coding tools (Copilot, ChatGPT, Cursor) or an eagerness to learn them.
Bonus: Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, Supabase, GCP) or containerized deployments.

You‚Äôll Thrive in This Role If You:
Enjoy switching contexts between frontend, backend, and mobile.
Value clarity, craftsmanship, and teamwork over quick fixes.
Are curious about AI-enhanced engineering and want to master it.
Like solving problems collaboratively and iterating fast.
Want to learn from senior engineers and grow into a leadership track.

What We Offer
Hybrid setup with an office presence in Singapore.
Modern stack (TypeScript, React, React Native, Supabase, NestJS).
Access to AI-powered developer tools and training on best practices.
Work within a squad that balances autonomy, mentorship, and experimentation.
Opportunities to grow into senior or technical leadership roles as the team scales.
